resources.string: I am a hardworking, self driven guy.I believe in continuous growth! Getting better every day.Progress is never linear. It takes time and effort which I enjoy.I have been coding since 2019. I have 2 years of basic coding experience.I am proficient in JAVA, CSS and the XML and HTML markup languages.
WHAT I BRING TO THE TEAM:

My skills in programming are merely average.But I believe with a continuous growth mindset.A daily dose of improvement and my unquenchable thirst to learn,I will bring a synergy to the whole team in your company.I pride myself with great interpersonal skills.This makes me a team player. I also work well under pressure.
